name: Alien Island
description:
*NOTES*

*Combat is still slightly buggy but i did my best with the time i had*

*textures aren't working ;( i have unity open so u can take a look at the terrain there*

Explore Alien Island, finding glowing gems, open doors, and explore the cool terrain! The objective is to kill the alien boss to retrieve the alien orb.

-------

CONTROLS

W / A / S / D -> Move Around

Space -> Jump

2 / 3 / 4 / 5 -> Place Gem

-------

I made this 3D game with little to no tutorial use, basically using the Unity Scripting API the whole time. Pretty proud of this game :)
